name: Over Learn
description:
How long can you last under the pressure of modern education

Do your homework, and make other projects in: Over Learn!

== Thank You For Playing ==

This is my second game, the first one was on LD37.
I took a more minimalist approach, my other ideas were too ambitious.
Because of this I had more time to polish up some rough edges.
I streamed making it at YouTube and Twitch (thanks to Restream)
Huge thanks for my test players:

  • Duke Cacois
  • Tersyus

Made for: Ludum Dare 40 Compo (under 48 hours, from scratch!)

Theme: The more you have the worse it is

Please vote on the game :)

== Tips ==

Read the README.txt
I recommend downloading the Full Package ;)
(It contains the game, the source code, some screenshots, and the two jingles in the game)
